title: About Brazilian Yu-Gi-Oh! League
intro.paragraph1: Brazilian Yu-Gi-Oh! League is a project made by PRRJCARDS and TCG Network with the aim of creating a competitive Brazilian community.
intro.paragraph2: Watch the video below to understand the objectives and the rules. (Only avaliable in Brazilian Portuguese)
follow.paragraph: Follow official channels on Twitch and watch the games analysis and live matches:
